name: Love Steps
description:
Love Steps

Welcome to Love Steps! You've done Kimiko wrong and she's really mad at you. Where will you lead your relationship? What you say is very important!

This is a small experiment where I tried to twist a visual novel into a platformer.

Project Status

Though a finished version of the project has been uploaded, I'm still getting rid of any bugs that you find and adding some details!

Platforms Available

Right now you can only play this game in browsers.

Used Assets

Programming and animations were made by me. I used different assets from amazing people who shared them online.

Voice Clips
Yume Background
Dating Sim UI Pack
Visual Novel Music
Multiple assets from Kenney
